Name: Wireshark
Description: Wireshark is a network protocol analyzer that enables you to capture and interactively browse the traffic running on a computer network.
HTU: Download and install Wireshark, start a network capture, and analyze the captured network data.

Name: Zeek
Description: Zeek is a powerful network analysis framework that is much different from the typical IDS you may know.
HTU: Install Zeek on a network monitoring system, configure it to monitor network traffic, and analyze the logs generated by Zeek.

Name: NetFlow Analyzer
Description: NetFlow Analyzer is a flow-based bandwidth monitoring and traffic analysis tool that helps you monitor network bandwidth and traffic patterns.
HTU: Install NetFlow Analyzer, configure it to collect NetFlow data from network devices, and start analyzing the traffic reports.

Name: Ntopng
Description: Ntopng is a network traffic probe that shows the network usage, similar to what the popular top Unix command does.
HTU: Install Ntopng, configure it to monitor network traffic, and use the web interface to analyze the network usage.

Name: Moloch
Description: Moloch is an open-source, large-scale, full packet capturing, indexing, and database system.
HTU: Install Moloch, set it up to capture network traffic, and use the web interface to search and analyze the captured data.
